She was not the only (i) _________ of the long-proposed legislation, but she was the (ii) _________ who finally got the bill onto the legislative agenda.
Blank (i)
Blank (ii)
(A) apologist
(D) catalyst
(B) critic
(E) mercenary
(C)  proponent
(F) lackey
